text: Paintings adorn every wall , a silk screen stands in the corner of the living room , and sculptures line the mantel .All of the oils , lithographs , sculptures and drawings on display were created by Resnik 's late husband , Arbit Blatas , and of the subjects the artist chose for his work , one is overwhelmingly represented : Kurt Weill 's " Threepenny Opera .
